'''Rowan''' was the oldest child of [[Holman the greenhanded]].

==History==
Rowan married [[Hob Gammidge]], a roper from [[Tighfield]]. They had one son, [[Hobson]], who became a roper like his father.<ref>{{App|Gamgee}}, p. 1105</ref>

==Etymology==
A ''[[wikipedia:Rowan|Rowan]]'' is [[Rowans|a type of tree]], the European mountain ash. The name is of Scandinavian origin akin to [[Norse]] ''rau√∞'' ("red"), because of its red berries.<ref>[[Jim Allan]] (ed.), ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names"</ref>
